text:

trans:
Unlimited local calls to all networks
360 local messages to all networks daily
For 343.48 SAR
To subscribe, send 360 to 1100
Mobily Prepaid 220:
100 GB of local internet, with unused balance rolled over to the next validity period upon auto-renewal
Unlimited local calls to all networks
Unlimited usage of social apps
For 220 SAR
To subscribe, send 220 to 1100
Mobily Prepaid 180:
80 GB of local internet, with unused balance rolled over to the next validity period upon auto-renewal
Unlimited local calls to all networks
Unlimited usage of social apps
For 180 SAR
To subscribe, send 180 to 1100
Mobily Prepaid 150:
55 GB of local internet, with unused balance rolled over to the next validity period upon auto-renewal
3000 local minutes to all networks
Unlimited usage of social apps
For 150 SAR
To subscribe, send 150 to 1100
Mobily Prepaid 110:
25+15 GB of local internet, with unused balance rolled over to the next validity period upon auto-renewal
1500 local minutes to all networks
30+70 GB for using social apps
For 110 SAR
To subscribe, send 110 to 1100
Mobily Prepaid 75:
10+10 GB of local internet
500 local minutes to all networks
10+10 GB for using social apps
